metadata.synopsis: The party comments on finding a blackmail letter from Gortash to Arfur - the toymaker - forcing him to get some stuff out of the Fireworks Shop and put this into the toys to donate for the refugees. It's unclear what it is, but something that is not good.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Wyrm's Crossing,Goto 361; 0; -990Unlock and open the chest, read the note there.

3.text: This must be where he was making them - there's no shortage of evidence.

2.text: Seems the owner of this place is responsible for those explosive stuffed bears in the barn.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: "The owner of this house... the toymaker... He was the one trapping the toys meant for the refugees!"

5.text: Looks as though the homeowner's up to no good - I only hope no one gets hurt.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: "Owner of this house is messing with something dangerous. These toys should be found and checked." We don't know the toys has explosives in them yet. There's no explosives in the basement as well.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: It looks like our merchant friend's the one who's been putting explosives in teddy bears.
6.context: InternalNodeContext: "Oh no, our friend Arfur is even worse than we thought. He was the one trapping the toys meant for the refugees!". We already found the trapped toys in the Big Barn. Now we learn he was the one making and donating them.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Might be worth checking Arfur's donations - looks like his generosity's compromised.
